text:
Hello, I have a question about app certification process - we have our app listed in marketplace, and would like to get it certified by HubSpot.
As far as I understand from minimum requirements to get certified - you can not do this if you have tried to apply for certification and failed in last six months. So does this mean, that if you fail to get certified - you have to wait for six months if you want to try again get your app certified?

I know the HS team is hard a work on some killer marketplace updates so I just wanted to drop this idea here.  As a marketplace creator, I'd LOVE LOVE LOVE the ability to add release notes that are part of the INSTALL UPDATE user flow.  Something like this could be awesome.

Sometimes an update requires a bit of instruction. Also, it would be great to clarify whats included in the updates (improvements, patches, bug fixes, etc.).  I get these sorts of questions all the time.

Hey Kevin! Thanks so much for the feedback! I’m the designer on the Marketplace team and I’m exploring helping providers add release notes whenever they update their listing. Would you be open to taking a look at some designs once they’re ready?
Hey <@UH0NMJZ46> I'd be more than happy to.  I've wanted this feature for a long time and I'd love to see how you're thinking about the experience for customers.
Great! I’ll reach out via slack soon!
